Alone.description: Is this just one object for the laser set? (Shouldn't this be a bool in that case?)

Pair.description: The object ID of the second laser for this set.

AmountOfLasers.description: How many lasers should fill this space.

SpaceBetweenLasers.description: How large should the (cosmetic) gaps between the lasers be.

OnTime.description: How long this set of lasers stay on for.

OffTime.description: How long this set of lasers stay off for.

Range.description: How far this laser can move vertically?

Speed.description: How fast this laser should move?
